name: NotebookLM
purpose: Multi-source research synthesis and document analysis
description: Google's AI research assistant that can synthesize information from multiple uploaded sources. Used for multi-source research synthesis in deep research workflows.

use_cases: generate interview questions (HR, Technical, Final round)
workflows: Upload company documents → NotebookLM synthesizes → Structured research notes
Multiple sources → Analysis → Summarized insights for LG team
WF-HR-001: Upload CVs + JD → Screen candidates → Rank top 5 with scores
WF-HR-002: Context from screening → Generate HR interview questions
WF-HR-003: Context from screening → Generate technical interview questions (Azure-focused)
actual_remote_helpers_usage.integration_context: Used alongside Gemini for deep research automation and HR recruitment workflows
